name: Pineapple Cucumber Agua Fresca
description: This pineapple cucumber agua fresca is light and refreshing, great for Sunday brunch or family gatherings. Recipe shared with permission from Familius Publisher.
recipeIngredient: ¼ cup + 2 tablespoons pure cane sugar

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and chop pineapple and cucumber. Place chunks in a blender. Blend until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Peel and chop pineapple and cucumber. Place chunks in a blender. Blend until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Add basil and sugar. Blend for 10 more seconds.
recipeInstructions.name: Add basil and sugar. Blend for 10 more seconds.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer mixture to a large pitcher and stir in water. Serve over ice.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer mixture to a large pitcher and stir in water. Serve over ice.

keywords: fresh fruit drinks, non-alcoholic drinks, summer drinks
